    @allure.title("Test Nitrosamine SAL")
    @allure.description("This test case test the  Nitrosamine SAL from list of production when global recovery "
                        "percentage is selected and sal unit is mg & default surface area is sqm")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86ctyk78q")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86ctyk781")
    @pytest.mark.nitrosamine_sal
    @pytest.mark.validate_nitrosamine_sal_global_recovery_mg_sqm
    def test_validate_nitrosamine_sal_global_recovery_mg_sqm(self):
        global_recovery_percentage = Excel.read_excel_col_name_row_number(const.get_master_data(),
                                                                          "config",
                                                                          "global_recovery_percentage",
                                                                          2)
        policy_data = {"salMassUnit": "mg", "globalRecoveryPercentage": global_recovery_percentage,
                       "useGlobalRecoveryPercentage": True}
        data = {}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_nitrosamine.test_get_nitrosamine_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        sal_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["productAndEquipmentLimits"]["salMassUnit"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_nitrosamine_payload(get_policy, policy_data)
        data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQM)
        self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(data)
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"] or sal_unit != "mg":
            self.update_nitrosamine.test_update_nitrosamine_limit_policy(data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        production_id = PRODUCTION_ID
        for prod in production_id:
            data.update({"production_id": prod})
            sheet_name = prod.lower() + "_nitrosamine"
            columns = ["Nitrosamine ID", "global_recovery_percentage_sal_mg_sqm"]
            manually_calculated_limit = self.calculated_sal_excel(sheet_name, columns)
            data.update({"production": prod})
            sal = self.get_production.get_production_nitrosamine_sal(data)
>           compare_sal(sal, manually_calculated_limit, columns, self.ERROR_MESSAGE)

    def compare(sal1, sal2, error_message):
        if sal1 != "#N/A" and sal2 != "#N/A":
            if sal1 < 1:
                length = (floor(log10(sal1)) - 1)
            else:
                length = 15 - len(str(int(sal1)))
            if length < 0:
                sal1 = (round(sal1, -length + 3))
                sal2 = (round(sal2, -length + 3))
                tolerance = calculate_tolerance(sal1)
